reuters.title: CANADA LEADING INDICATOR UP 0.4 PCT IN JANUARY AFTER 0.4 PCT DECEMBER RISE - OFFICIAL
reuters.body: Colombia has opened coffee registrations for June shipment with no limit set for private exporters, as in April and May, a National Coffee Growers' Federation official said. Colombia has sold an average of 900,000 bags per month since the beginning of the calendar year. Reuter 
